column3: Description
Ensure cramfs kernel module is disabled
Ensure freevxfs kernel module is disabled
Ensure hfs kernel module is disabled
Ensure hfsplus kernel module is disabled
Ensure jffs2 kernel module is disabled
Ensure squashfs kernel module is disabled
Ensure udf kernel module is disabled
Ensure usb-storage kernel module is disabled
Ensure /tmp is a separate partition
Ensure nodev option is set on /tmp
Ensure nosuid option is set on /tmp
Ensure noexec option is set on /tmp
Ensure /dev/shm is a separate partition
Ensure nodev option is set on /dev/shm
Ensure nosuid option is set on /dev/shm
Ensure noexec option is set on /dev/shm
Ensure /home is a separate partition
Ensure nodev option is set on /home
Ensure /var is on a separate partition
Ensure /var/tmp is on a separate partition
Ensure nodev option is set on /var/tmp
Ensure nosuid option is set on /var/tmp
Ensure noexec option is set on /var/tmp
Ensure bootloader password is set
Ensure SELinux is installed
Ensure SELinux is in enforcing mode
Ensure SELinux policy is configured
Ensure Message of the Day (MOTD) is configured properly
Ensure xinetd is not installed
Ensure time synchronization is configured
Ensure cron daemon is enabled and active
Ensure firewalld is installed and running
Ensure IPv6 is disabled if not required
Ensure auditd is installed and enabled
Ensure audit logs are not automatically deleted
Ensure password complexity is enforced
Ensure password reuse is restricted
Ensure root SSH login is disabled
Ensure system-wide cryptographic policies are set to at least DEFAULT
Ensure OpenSSH is configured securely
Ensure audit log files mode is configured
Ensure audit log files owner is configured
Ensure audit log files group owner is configured
Ensure audit configuration files mode is configured
Ensure audit configuration files owner is configured
Ensure audit configuration files group owner is configured
Ensure audit tools mode is configured
Ensure audit tools owner is configured
Ensure audit tools group owner is configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/passwd are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/passwd- are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/group are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/group- are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/shadow are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/shadow- are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/gshadow are configured
Ensure permissions on /etc/gshadow- are configured
Ensure accounts in /etc/passwd use shadowed passwords
Ensure /etc/shadow password fields are not empty
